CustomField.formula: IF( AND(TEXT( Region1__c ) = "HGROWTH" , OR(TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "Brazil",TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "Columbia" , TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "Mexico")), "HG AMERICAS", IF( AND(TEXT( Region1__c ) = "Americas" , AND(TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "Brazil",TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "Columbia" , TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "Mexico")), "AMERICAS", IF( AND(TEXT( Region1__c ) = "HGROWTH" , OR(TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "India",TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "Middle East" , TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "Poland", TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c) = "Russia", TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "Turkey")), "HG EMEAI", IF( AND(TEXT( Region1__c ) = "EMEAI" , AND(TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "India",TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "Middle East" , TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "Poland", TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "Russia", TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "Turkey")), "EMEAI", IF( AND(TEXT( Region1__c ) = "HGROWTH" , OR(TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "China",TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "Indonesia" , TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) = "South Korea")), "HG APAC", IF( AND(TEXT( Region1__c ) = "APAC" , AND(TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "China",TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c ) != "Indonesia" , TEXT( Related_Opportunity__r.Account.Report_Country_Name__c) != "South Korea")), "APAC",""))))))
CustomField.label: Region For Dashboard
